text:
THE OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY
TELECOMMUNICATIONS CENTER
2470 NORTH STAR ROAD
COLUMBUS 21, OHIO
Richard B. Hull, Executive Director
May 5, 1961
William G. Harley
Suite 1119
1346 Connecticut Ave., N.W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
Just received notice of the Educational Media Council meeting
to be held at West Point, New York, June 1, 2 and 3.
i am assuming that either you or Harold will plan to attend.
I may be able to get to the October meeting, if it will help,
but I would rather skip this one. The schedule around that
time is rather tight.
Sincerely
Richard B. Hull
RBH:df
